mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item VALUES ( item_index.nextval, #{item_code}, #{item_category}, #{item_detail_category}, #{item_name}, #{item_img}, #{item_detail_img}, #{item_content}, #{item_brand}, #{item_price},#{item_quantity},#{item_color},#{item_size}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET item_code=#{item_code}, item_category=#{item_category}, item_detail_category=#{item_detail_category}, item_name=#{item_name}, item_img=#{item_img}, item_detail_img=#{item_detail_img}, item_content=#{item_content}, item_content=#{item_content}, item_brand=#{item_brand}, item_price=#{item_price} WHERE item_code=#{old_item_code}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT item_code, item_category, item_detail_category, item_name, item_img, item_detail_img, item_content, item_brand, item_price FROM item WHERE item_name=#{item_name}
SELECT DISTINCT item_img, item_price, item_name FROM item WHERE item_category = #{item_category}
SELECT DISTINCT item_img, item_price, item_name FROM item WHERE item_category = #{item_category} AND item_detail_category = #{item_detail_category}
SELECT item_index FROM item WHERE item_category=#{item_category}
SELECT item_code FROM item WHERE item_index=#{item_index}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_list WHERE item_index=#{item_index}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT item_code FROM item);
